body:
Thanks for the report.

I forgot about the `put14` command when we changed the auth. FWIW, `put14` isn't very useful, since `push` does it for you anyway. I think we've made the decision to just nuke the old auth mode and old _user-x-builder-n_ notation entirely (which was never finished anyway), and use the new proxy-via-coordinator style. That will simplify the gomote code. I'll use this bug for that.
